players.name: Alice
memory: The villager Bob was found dead.
Beware, Charlie is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Charlie: "Be cautious of Alice, she's the mafioso I discovered last night."
You: "Charlie, you're a detective. You know I'm the mafioso. Don't believe everything you see."
Diana: "Bob was killed by the mafioso. I think Alice is the mafioso because Charlie said so."
